about_the_game:
Beamdown is a 3D top-down action game featuring fast combat, upgrades, and difficult big bosses. Explore the different planet environments, take down large boss, upgrade your character, and repeat.

Beam down to each planet and conduct research for the Societias Philanthropia! Take on varying enemy types and combine your upgrades to create the ultimate kit! Players will play as E.R.O. 4, the Societias Philanthropia’s newest iteration of Research Operatives.



Beam down to various planets on a research quest from the Societas Philanthropia! Discover new enemies and customize your abilities to become the ultimate killing machine! Players will play as E.R.O.4—the newest and shiniest research operative robot available—as they crush foes in their way.



Fight and utterly decimate each planet’s guardian in the name of the SP! Experience unique and exciting combat scenarios with each boss—reaping bountiful rewards upon defeating them!



Create the kit that works best for your own playstyle! E.R.O. 4 is a highly adaptable robot that comes with a refined selection of upgrades to use on its research journeys. You want to dash as much as possible, dive into danger and deliver devastating melee damage? You got it! Want to become lord of fire and burn everything in sight? That’s an option! The Societas Philanthropia has accounted for all your burning desires with the most innovative robot they’ve ever made.



Explore different worlds as E.R.O. 4! Find different cultures and ways of life as you research planets for the Societias Philanthropia. Immerse yourself in the universe the Societias Philanthropia is creating, and discover their true intentions.
